title: Saturday's Runoff Will Decide If Sen. Landrieu Still Represents Louisiana
teaser: Democrat Mary Landrieu is in the last day of a bitter campaign to try to keep her Senate seat. Voters will choose between Landrieu, who has served three terms, and Republican Rep. Bill Cassidy.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
